Articles.Content: Now with your amazing work about the procedural algorithm, the terrain map classes and the suberb science system you shown the door to the resource gatheing, now please let us in.

1. Harvester is not the only Developer of this game.

2. Don't push these guys to release .22. Doing hard work is hard

1. Harvester is not the only Developer of this game.

2. Don't push these guys to release .22. Doing hard work is hard

This is a "I WANT RESOURCES" whine, not a "LET ME HAVE 0.22" whine.

For me, I can wait for resources.

Think of it this way- for career mode resources, you could generate science, initally starting out with ineffecient fuel, then more, and lighter fuel, then spend a lot of science to mine, etc.

This is a "I WANT RESOURCES" whine, not a "LET ME HAVE 0.22" whine.

Ooooh, a whine aficionado Perhaps a selection of cheeses should be suggested! Smoked Gooda(sp?) might be good

Smoked Gooda(sp?) might be good

Gouda. Also, I prefer a nice Oregon pinot.

Oh my aching sulfites. They maeks my hed hrt.

And gouda is too soft.

Think of it this way- for career mode resources, you could generate science, initally starting out with ineffecient fuel, then more, and lighter fuel, then spend a lot of science to mine, etc.

The whole tech tree will have to be reworked for that, so i am sure they arent going that route but just the basic kethane of "get resource->get fuel back".

There was a whole chart about it by i am sure it was dropped

This is a "I WANT RESOURCES" whine, not a "LET ME HAVE 0.22" whine.

Whoops, looks like I got confused with all these whines nowadays

What a cheesy excuse, isn't it :D:D:D
What topic? OP was simply whining about resources, then we went to cheeses, and I think this thread wasn't even on the rails to begin with.
Please keep a little respect in the way you address other users. Thread closed.
